projects.title: trust-generator
projects.longDescription: TrustGenerator is an insured management system whose front-end is developed in Vue.js and the back-end in nodejs with Express.

projects.title: scanteate
projects.description: Mobile app to support the socio-emotional development of children with autism.
projects.longDescription: SCANTEATE is a mobile app to support the socio-emotional development of children with autism. Its main strength is its versatility and combination of tools, as it has a live emotional detection system; just click a button and the emotion will be present.

projects.title: la-excelencia-joyeria
projects.longDescription: A point of sale that is responsible for recording sales, managing inventory, processing payments, generating reports, and much more.

projects.title: kidcash
projects.description: Mobile app to promote good financial health in children.
projects.longDescription: Mobile app to promote good financial health in children. It has activities, reminders and a user-friendly interface.

projects.title: cloud-storage
projects.longDescription: Drive-style cloud file management API developed with innovative technologies.
